description: Task Penguin is a simple to use To-Do/Task list where you can store items for access at any time. If you are going to want that list away from your Echo, simply ask Alexa for the list of tasks and have the completed list sent as a card to your app.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Task Penguin how many tasks do I have
Create a new task buy milk
name: Task Penguin
shortDescription: Create and manage simple to-do lists or shopping lists straight from Alexa and have the list send as a card to your app.
